name: Complete 1 Task
description:
I'm experimenting with GB Studio. This is the first "game" I've made with assets that are not my own. I wanted to see if I could code a simple task that persisted outside of multiple rooms. I used assets that came with GB Studio. None of the art is my own. This is purely for testing out how to make a game and how to display it here.

Controls are:

ASDW = movement

J = interact
